We refer to Wikipedia articles on computer operating systems for help. When someone installs Windows 10, they will see the Windows 10 Setup dialog titled 'Applicable notices and license terms' which lists Microsoft Software License Terms with Decline and Accept buttons.

The correct answer is B: He recommends using the Free up disk space feature to clean unnecessary files.
In the audio, the speaker mentions that during the Windows 10 Setup process, it will report that 8 GB of free disk space is needed on the C: drive. To address this, the speaker advises the listener to use the Free up disk space feature to remove any unnecessary files and make space available. This feature helps to optimize the system's performance by identifying and deleting temporary files, cache, and other unnecessary data that takes up space on the hard drive.
